subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: South Florida’s gave Coach Skip Holtz an emotional victory in his return to Notre Dame, which he attended and where his father, Lou Holtz, led the Irish to their last national title in 1988.
snippet: South Florida’s gave Coach Skip Holtz an emotional victory in his return to Notre Dame, which he attended and where his father, Lou Holtz, led the Irish to their last national title in 1988.
